O

onClickAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
Controls the add button Adds the selected part from the all parts table to the associated parts table Displays an alert message if no part is selected
onClickAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
Controls the add button Adds the selected part to the associated parts table
onClickCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
Controls the cancel button and returns to the main screen when clicked Also displays a confirmation message which must be accepted before returning to the main screen
onClickCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
Controls the cancel button Displays a confirmation message and launches main screen if confirmed
onClickCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
Controls the cancel button Cancels any unsaved changes to the part Displays a confirmation message before returning the user to the main screen
onClickCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
Controls cancel button Displays a confirmation message before returning the user to the main screen
onClickExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the exit button Exits the application
onClickInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
Controls the In-House radio button The Label is set to "Machine ID" when clicked
onClickInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
Controls the In-House radio button Label is set to "Machine ID" when selected
onClickOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
Controls the Outsourced radio button The Label is set to "Company Name" when clicked
onClickOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
Controls the Outsourced radio button Label is set to "Company Name" when selected
onClickPartAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the part add button Launches the Add Part Screen
onClickPartDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls part delete button Displays an error message if no part was selected Displays a confirmation message before deleting the part
onClickPartModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the part modify button Launches the modify part screen
onClickProductAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the product add button Launches the Add Product Screen
onClickProductDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the product delete button Displays an error message if there was no product selected Displays a confirmation before deleting the product Prevents the user from deleting a product that has one or more associated parts
onClickProductModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the product modify button Launches the Modify Product Screen
onClickRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
Controls the remove button Removes part from associated parts table Displays a confirmation message before removing the part
onClickRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
Controls the remove associated parts button Removes part from the associated parts table Displays an error message if no part was selected Displays a confirmation message before removing the part
onClickSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
Controls the save button and adds part to inventory Returns to the main screen after clicking on the button Displays error messages if text fields are invalid
onClickSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
Controls the save button Adds new product to the inventory and launches the main screen Alert messages are displayed if text field is invalid
onClickSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
Controls the save button Saves and replaces updated part in the inventory Launches the main screen Checks validation of all text fields through error messages
onClickSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
Controls the save button Updates product in the inventory and launches the main screen Alert messages are displayed if text field is invalid
